en-US.Click or drag files to this area to uplo: Click or drag files to this area to upload
en-US.flash-confirm: The flash image was uploaded. Below is the checksum and file size listed, compare them with the original file to ensure data integrity. Click '{ btn }' below to start the flash procedure.
en-US.Firmware verification failed. Please upl: Firmware verification failed. Please upload the firmware again
en-US.Keep settings and retain the current con: Keep settings and retain the current configuration

zh-CN.Click or drag files to this area to uplo: 点击或者拖动文件到该区域来上传
zh-CN.flash-confirm: 固件已上传。下面是列出的校验和及文件大小，将它们与原始文件进行比较以确保数据完整性。 单击下面的 "{ btn }" 开始刷写操作
zh-CN.Firmware verification failed. Please upl: 固件校验失败，请重新上传
zh-CN.Keep settings and retain the current con: 保持设置并保留当前配置

zh-TW.Click or drag files to this area to uplo: 點擊或者拖動文件到該區域來上傳
zh-TW.flash-confirm: 固件已上傳。 下麵是列出的校驗和及文件大小，將它們與原始檔案進行比較以確保數據完整性。 按一下下麵的 "{ btn }" 開始刷寫操作
zh-TW.Firmware verification failed. Please upl: 固件校驗失敗，請重新上傳
